sample.title: Remoting Serialization Sample
sample.overview: This sample shows how to use the different formatters to serialize a class to a file and read it back into memory. There are five different executables.
sample.subdirectory:
Technologies\Remoting\Advanced\Serialization
The source and makefile for ToFile.exe
The source and makefile for ISerializableClient.exe
The source and makefile for ToFile.exe
The source and makefile for SoapMessageClient.exe and PlanetEarth.exe

buildsteps.step:
Type nmake -a all from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Remoting\Advanced\Serialization> nmake -a all

runsteps.step: Run the executables described above from a console window.
